00033     struct _LPCSVR_MESSAGE * MessagePool ; // List of message buffers

00035     ULONG MessagePoolLimit ;        // max # messages
00036     ULONG ReceiveThreads ;          // Number of threads with Recieve pending
00037     HANDLE ShutdownEvent ;          // Event to signal during shutdown
00038 } LPCSVR_SERVER, * PLPCSVR_SERVER ;
